DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Version 1.0 Adult Physical Health Domain Sexual Function and Satisfaction Interfering Factors SFFAC101 Past 30 Days How Much Fatigue or Lack of Energy Affects Satisfaction with Sex Life Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much in the past 30 days fatigue or lack of energy has affected their satisfaction with their sex life, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Sexual Function and Satisfaction Interfering Factors Past 30 Days How Much Fatigue or Lack of Energy Affects Satisfaction with Sex Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A subgroup of PROMIS Sexual Function and Satisfaction item scales that assess self-reported perceptions of the degree to which various factors affect satisfaction with sex life in men and women._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how much an individual's fatigue or lack of energy affects or affected satisfaction with their sex life._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Sexual Function and Satisfaction Interfering Factors Subordinate Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:A subgroup of PROMIS Sexual Function and Satisfaction item scales that assess self-reported perceptions of the degree to which various factors affect satisfaction with sex life in men and women.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: Sexual Function and Satisfaction Interfering Factors Subordinate Domain
Concepts.definition: A subgroup of PROMIS Sexual Function and Satisfaction item scales that assess self-reported perceptions of the degree to which various factors affect satisfaction with sex life in men and women.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Much Fatigue or Lack of Energy Affects Satisfaction with Sex Life Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about how much an individual's fatigue or lack of energy affects or affected satisfaction with their sex life.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Much Fatigue or Lack of Energy Affects Satisfaction with Sex Life
Concepts.definition: A question about how much an individual's fatigue or lack of energy affects or affected satisfaction with their sex life.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PROMIS:Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System, PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group, 2008-2012

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how much of something an individual experiences from 1: Not at all, to 5: Very much.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Past 30 Days No Fatigue or Lack of Energy

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Past 30 Days No Fatigue or Lack of Energy
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not had fatigue or lack of energy in the past 30 days.

Concepts.longName: Past 30 Days No Fatigue or Lack of Energy
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not had fatigue or lack of energy in the past 30 days.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
